question: Which authority is the implementing agency of Jal Vikas Marg?
explanation: The Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI) is implementing the Jal Marg Vikas Project (JMVP). It is done at an estimated cost of ?5369.18 crores for capacity augmentation of navigation on the Haldia-Varanasi stretch of Ganga (part of NW-1) with the technical and financial assistance of the World Bank.
